review_title: Freedom available but at what cost
pros: A lot of autonomy A lot of down time Inviting co-workers
cons: Mentally draining dealing with angry parents and students. Management lack structure and knowledge to help student assistants succeed. Management doesn't help you with difficult problems. Management is rarely in office. No synergy
